quest.name: Brew as the Tholl Do
journal:
 Quest Sync
Xorutt is short and bearded and ready to brew.
objectives: Find clumps of magma grass and collect magma blooms.
Deliver the magma blooms to Xorutt.

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: Lali-ho! Say, ain't you that travelerforeign dwarf everyone's been talking about?

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: Well, lali-ho again and welcome to Tomra! I'm going to treat you to some Tholl hospitality, and I'll not take no for an answer!

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: First things first: we brew some dwarven ale together! Aye, that'll be a lark!

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: Now, most folk make their ale from barley, but not us dwarves. We use seeds harvested from the magma grass what grows on the slopes of Mt. Gulg.

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: Them weeds drink in the sea air from the moment their heads poke out of the dirt to the moment they wilt and die. Gives our grog a tangy flavor you won't never taste in any of that barley-brewed stuff!

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: So! Let's give you the full experience, shall we? Head on out of the village, and pluck me four or so good-sized magma blooms─they're crammed tight with seeds, don't you know!

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: ...What do magma blooms look like? Well, they're tall and orange and probably a bit sparkly. You'll know when you see 'em.

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: Well? Did you pluck them blooms like I asked you? Brewing time's a-wasting!

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: Aye, that's enough seeds to stuff my helm and then some! Good work! This next part of the process is a bit tricky, so let's leave that to an expert. Which would be me.

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: But don't wander away just yet, my friend! There's more to our traditions than just picking sparkly flowers, and we're just getting started!
